trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Beaumont
There were no other sightings in Beaumont on or around September 30th 1979
divs: Sighting Detailsat sunset in the wheel house of the boat mr fern pushinging barges with my uncle(RIP)headed west towards Galviston Tx. A silver glowing disc shaped object appeared over the barges. It hoovered on top the barges for a few seconds we looked at one another in disbeliefe (me and my uncle)i graped the vhs radio hollered what do you want who are you then it took off immediately towards the south west and was out of sight just as fast as it had appeared.My uncle and i agreed no one would believe us and we kept it to ourselves untill now.
Summary: A object appeard above the barges we were pushing on intercostal waterways it was silver looking.
